channel.title: Leeching [READ NOW OR BE AT RISK FOR A WARN OR WORSE]
channel.description:
It appears many people are accusing others of 'leeching', or stealing and re-releasing without credit, other people's work. This applies to the following sections primarily:
[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]RS2 Server Downloads[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html]RS2 Server Tutorials[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,129.0.html]Models[/url]
Leeching is strictly forbidden and will result in a lock of the topic charged with leeching. Excessive leeching will result in a ban, so do not try it. You [i]can[/i] post another person's server [b]if and only if the person has given credit and is appropriately accredited[/b]. Failure to comply with this will result in a lock of the charged topic.
[b]Note to all people accusing someone else of leeching: [/b] do NOT accuse someone else of leeching unless you have [b]ABSOLUTE PROOF[/b]. Failure to do this can result in a warning or worse for you, considering it is very annoying looking at people accusing others of leeching with zero proof.
Finally, this new rule can be bent heavily depending on the discretion of the moderator. The punishment for leeching will result from a locked topic to a ban, depending on the level of leeching and whether it was excessive. People accusing others of leeching can also be punished from a warning to a mute depending on the discretion of the moderator.

item.title: Leeching [READ NOW OR BE AT RISK FOR A WARN OR WORSE]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It appears many people are accusing others of ‘leeching’, or stealing and re-releasing without credit, other people’s work. This applies to the following sections primarily:

RS2 Server Downloads
RS2 Server Tutorials
Models

Leeching is strictly forbidden and will result in a lock of the topic charged with leeching. Excessive leeching will result in a ban, so do not try it. You can post another person’s server if and only if the person has given credit and is appropriately accredited. Failure to comply with this will result in a lock of the charged topic.

Note to all people accusing someone else of leeching: do NOT accuse someone else of leeching unless you have ABSOLUTE PROOF. Failure to do this can result in a warning or worse for you, considering it is very annoying looking at people accusing others of leeching with zero proof.

Finally, this new rule can be bent heavily depending on the discretion of the moderator. The punishment for leeching will result from a locked topic to a ban, depending on the level of leeching and whether it was excessive. People accusing others of leeching can also be punished from a warning to a mute depending on the discretion of the moderator.

Read full topic
